name: Fix Me
description:
2 Dimensional platformer/puzzle game where you control a blob who is looking for its body parts in a dangerous area.

Music credit to renmine! More of his stuff here: https://renmine2.newgrounds.com/

Might contain some bugs and lack in some features.

Originally the game was supposed to be longer, and the player would have had to gather more than 2 separate body parts, but we sort of ran out of time, and decided to just merge hands and legs/body. This also sort of  makes the game title "Fix Me", incorrect,  as there is just 2 different body parts, eyes and rest of the body. However, we have plans to complete this game/make a second part for it, as this is just a submission for a Game Jam, so stay tuned!

The game was intended to have more features, but the time limit came in too fast. 

The game doesn't have any tutorial. It uses A and D for movement (left and right) and spacebar for jumping. You are supposed to get to the other side of the map, where you are at. There is also no end for the game.
